Monday, January 24(/i, I853.
The meeting was called to order at half past 6 o'clock
p. m., S. W. Oakey, in the chair. Stockholders representing eight thousand seven hundred and fifty-five shares
were present. The Chairman briefly stated the object of
The President of the Company submitted, on the part of
the Board of Directors, their first Annual Report, accompanied by the Report of the Chief Engineer. Both documents having been read, Mr. Wm. M. Goodrich offered the
following resolution, which was unanimously adopted:
Resolved, That this, the first Annual Report of the President and Directors to the Stockholders, with the accompanying documents, and a map of the proposed route of
this Road to the Sabine, and its extension through Texas,
Arkansas and Missouri, be published with the proceedings
of the Meeting, in pamphlet form, for general distribution
among the Stockholders; and that a copy of the same be
addressed by the Secretary to each Stockholder.
Resolved, That the Board of Directors be requested to
cause the said rcpuris to bo published in any newspapers in
this State or elsewhere, to enlighten the public mind as to
the importance of this great work, not only to the State of
Louisiana, but to the entire territory west of the Mississippi.
Mr. Denegre offered a resolution, fixing calls for further
installments, as required by the 3d section, of the Charter,
which, after being amended by G. B. Duncan, Esq... was
adopted as follows:
